Title: Certification of users by 'Safe Researcher' training and/or passport
Description: Training on using the TRE project space, statistical disclosure & data access. Safe researcher training should include ethical guidance to assure that users understand their ethical responsibilities while analysing sensitive data, awareness of implications of data transfer to 3rd countries, as well as basic training on using a TRE project space to familiarize users with working in a TRE. Basic user guildelines or guidance videos or ad-hoc trainings could be an option to increase user friendliness and user satisfaction.
